solPicker
Class CommandLineParser

java.lang.Object
  solPicker.CommandLineParser

public class CommandLineParser
extends java.lang.Object

The command line parser for SolPicker. Available options are - databaseDir, out,help,inFile,localDir,netDir. The required options are out, inFile, and a blast directory. If you use the local blast localDir you must also have the genome database downloaded onto your computer. Instructions can be found here: NCBIBlastLocal.setDB(String).

Author:
tizatt
